description: Released v1.7.4 with complete fix for .julieignore auto-generation. Fixed 4 critical bugs: (1) removed workspace init conflict that created generic .julieignore before vendor detection, (2) added ancestor-walking to detect empty parent directories like plugin/ with 103 files in subdirs, (3) also check directories themselves not just ancestors to handle libs/ with 6 direct files, (4) added skip_minified_check flag to defer minified filtering until after vendor detection so libs/ counts all 6 files not just 2. Real-world tested on SurgeryScheduling workspace, now correctly detects all 3 vendor directories. Feature is production-ready for legacy codebases.
